title: Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team
synopsis: In year 0079 of the Universal Century, the Earth Federation initiates Operation Odessaâ€”a full-scale assault to retake a major Ukrainian city from the Principality of Zeon. It is a success, and the remaining Zeon forces scatter across the globe. The Earth Federation gains the upper hand in the One Year War and deploys its ground troops around the planet to hunt down the stragglers.
